traits.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Izek hits with it (included in the attack).

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Izek makes two attacks with his battleaxe.

actions.name: Battleaxe
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) slashing damage, or 15 ({@dice 2d10 + 4}) when used with two hands.

actions.name: Hurl Flame
entries: Ranged Spell atk +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 10 (3d6 damage) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it catches fire.
